comment: Tommy calls the press 'the enemy of the people' This man is NOT a politician. He has my support. The only man the British press hates more than Tommy Robinson is Vladimir Putin.
amr:
# ::snt Tommy calls the press 'the enemy of the people' This man is NOT a politician. He has my support. The only man the British press hates more than Tommy Robinson is Vladimir Putin.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / call-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Tommy"
                        :op2 "Robinson"))
            :ARG1 (p2 / press)
            :ARG2 (e / enemy
                  :poss (p3 / person)))
      :snt2 (p4 / politician
            :polarity -
            :domain (m2 / man
                  :mod (t / this)))
      :snt3 (s / support-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (h / he))
      :snt4 (h2 / hate-01
            :ARG0 (p5 / press
                  :mod (c2 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Britain")))
            :ARG1 (m3 / man
                  :mod (o / only)
                  :domain (p6 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Vladimir"
                              :op2 "Putin")))
            :ARG2-of (h3 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 m3
                  :ARG3 (m4 / more)
                  :ARG4 p)))
